net.sourceforge.gxl
Class GXLDocumentAdapter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.gxl.GXLDocumentAdapter
public class GXLDocumentAdapter
extends Object

Adapter for the GXLDocumentListener interface, providing empty method bodies.

Since:
0.91
See Also:
GXLDocumentListener

gxlAttrValueChanged

public void gxlAttrValueChanged(GXLAttrValueModificationEvent e)
Invoked when an attr elements value has been replaced. This has been added to accomodate changing value types, which was rather tedious before.

Parameters:
e - The event describing the modification.
Since:
0.91
